name: Shake Moe Girl
summary:
It is an application to which the girl shakes when the screen is beaten. 
It progresses when the circle that appears sequentially is memorized, and the screen is beaten similarly.
Please enjoy it with the voice!!
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 开发者: alife inc.
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=me.animania.moegirl01
